name: Character Needed
description:
TRY THIS VERSION IF YOU'RE LAGGING:

https://andreferreirav2.github.io/character_needed/

With Mark Brown's consent, here is the non laggy version of the game.  Same game minus the lag. (Sorry)

_________________________________________________________

Character Needed

Theme: Platformer without Character

What would happen if a platformer had no hero? Play Character Needed to find out!

How to Play: Click&Drag the platforms, find the 4 keys, exit through the door!

ProTip!: Move the mouse slowly! Maybe reduce the resolution/quality to improve framerate

Credits:
André Ferreira (@_andreferreira_) - Game Designer, Developer, Art & Sound Effects
Elizabeth Larez (@E1Larez) - UX & Game User Research Consultant
